samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript autocomplete control shows the default rendering of the autocomplete with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Grouping and Icons
samples.description: This demo explains the grouping based on different categories with individual header and icon support in the Syncfusion JavaScript autocomplete control.

samples.name: Data Binding
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript autocomplete control shows how to bind with  local data source and how to fetch data from remote data service.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript autocomplete control shows how to customize the appearance of each item in the pop-up list using template option.

samples.name: Highlight
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript autocomplete control shows the built-in support to highlight the searched characters in the suggested list items.

samples.name: Custom Filtering
samples.description: This demo explains the custom filtering functionalities of the Syncfusion JavaScript autocomplete control.

samples.name: Diacritics Filtering
samples.description: This demo explains the diacritics filter functionality of the Syncfusion JavaScript autocomplete control.
